name: getfutureeventsbytopic
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool azure_smartable.
Tool description: The Azure Smartable API offers the Microsoft Azure news, learning resources, events, influencers and other information.
API description: Retrieve future Azure events related to a specified topic, paginated by the given page number.

topic.description: The topic for which to retrieve future Azure events.

page.description: The page number for the paginated list of events.
